steps.step: Boil potatoes in salted water to cover by 1 inch for 12 to 15 minutes or until just tender, then drain. When potatoes are cool enough to handle, cut into 1/3-inch-thick slices.
Toss potatoes together with all remaining ingredients except arugula and season with salt and pepper.
· Canned oysters can vary widely in size, depending on the brand. We used Bumble Bee canned oysters when testing this recipe.· Potatoes may be cooked 1 day ahead, cooled, and kept chilled, covered.
